title: Manage a Joint Check Agreement
description: A subcontractor is having financial trouble, so a joint check agreement is put in place with their material supplier. The accountant must process a payment accordingly.

tasks.description: Verify that a valid joint check agreement is on file for the subcontractor and their supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the agreement is in place.

tasks.description: When processing the subcontractor's payment, issue the check as payable to both the subcontractor and the material supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: A joint check is correctly generated.
